body_html: @anikalindtner : as far as I have seen I would not break this out into a separate app anyway. (It was apparently once a separate app and then got integrated.) Anyway, it does not look super complicated, I would like to sit down with someone who cares and knows about the process and figure out where we want to go. (What to hide in the blind selection and what to change in the existing process.)
